column4: hi, I want to install python 2.6 and python 2.7 in the same environment how can I do it and switch between both versions?
if they are both in the package manage then its easy. the command python2.6 will give you that version and python2.7 the other
youre welcome . in your system you will also have python. wich will be a symlink to either 2.6 or 2.7
